function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unsanitary conditions in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, enforcement of hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Disinfection robots, UV sanitation equipment","People":"Occupants, visitors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Lack of ventilation and air circulation","Impact":"Higher concentration of airborne pathogens","Mitigation":"Installation of air purifiers, regular maintenance of ventilation systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, HVAC systems with UV-C light","People":"Occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Inadequate waste management","Impact":"Propagation of disease vectors and contamination of the environment","Mitigation":"Proper waste disposal and recycling practices, use of sealed bins","Technologies":"Automated waste sorting systems, waste compactors","People":"Occupants, waste management staff","Owner":"Building management, waste management staff"}]}
